item.description:
Hello Blackstone Climbers,

I need to know if any of you are intending on going to Leominster State Park this Sunday so we
can coordinate with the other climbing group and set a meeting spot rather than all of us drive into
Porter Square and hunt for parking in Cambridge. Or would you all rather just meet the other
group at Leominster. Please let me know so I can coordinate this thing with Geoff. I don't usually
post my phone number but i will on this occasion. 774-291-1009. If you need a ride you can ride with
me i have room for 3 people and gear. Also swimming and picknicking frolic to follow .

Climb on

Arleen

p.s. Novice climbers are very welcome to come this will be a good first time outdoors for some of you
so get on board lots of experienced climbers to lend a hand several top ropes will be set up

group.name: The Arleen Virga Blackstone Rock Climbing Meetup

item.name: sunday the 20th In/Out
